DOC.brief_summary: To determine compare pharmacokinetics ( PK ) single dose two formulation 12.5 mg 25 mg Androxal administer healthy male volunteer , determine compare safety single dose two formulation 12.5 mg 25 mg Androxal administer healthy male volunteer .
DOC.criteria: Speaks , read , understand English Spanish willing able provide write informed consent Institutional Review Board ( IRB ) approve form prior initiation study procedure ; Male , age 1860 year ; No significant abnormal finding screen physical examination evaluate Investigator ; Normal laboratory value ( abnormal clinically significant ) screening determined Investigator ; Subject willing remain clinic overnight Day 1 Day 6 visit ; Must able swallow gelatin capsule Known hypersensitivity Clomid ; Abnormal screen visit vital sign clinical laboratory evaluation consider clinically significant Investigator ; Subject significant organ abnormality disease determine Investigator ; Any medical condition would interfere study determined Investigator ; Slow Cytochrome P4502D6 ( CYP2D6 ) metabolizer Participation clinical trial investigational medication within 30 day prior study medication administration ; An acute illness within 5 day study medication administration ; ; A mental condition render subject unable understand nature , scope , possible consequence study and/or evidence uncooperative attitude , determine Investigator ; History venous thromboembolic disease ( e.g . deep vein thrombosis pulmonary embolism ) ; History myocardial infarction , unstable angina , symptomatic heart failure , ventricular dysrhythmia , know history ( correct QT ) QTc interval prolongation ; An employee family member employee study site Sponsor .
